OutcomeActivity.name: OutcomeActivity
OutcomeActivity.description: Represents a junction between Outcome and the object that's related to the activity undertaken by an organization to achieve that outcome.

CareProgramId.description: The care program associated with the outcome activity.

LastReferencedDate.description: Date and time when a user last referenced this outcome activity.

LastViewedDate.description: Date and time when a user last viewed this outcome activity.

Name.description: The name of the outcome activity.

OutcomeActivityType.description: The type of activity that's associated with the outcome, such as care program.

OutcomeId.description: The outcome that's associated with the outcome activity.
